reviewText: Great techniques from a couple of MMA's best!!!

I am always looking for new ways to improve my MMA training. This dvd series supplied me with a wealth of knowledge that has brought my skills to a whole new level. I use it at least once a week to review and prepare my skills for practice.

I have been in and out of MMA training for a few years now. I was looking for something to help refresh my memory and get me back in the groove of things. This video helped me immensely! It was the perfect reboot for my training, and I highly recommend it for any level of fighter.

I loved this video! I was looking to get in shape but was tired of doing the same routine. I'm a huge fan of Urijahs and thought what the heck, I'll buy it. I'm in better shape now and even learned how to beat some a** in the process. It's a must buy! You won't regret it!

This is a great tool for all levels of fighters. I myself am a beginner and found that the lessons given by Urijah and Phil greatly improved my technique and form. Yes it is expensive, but the amount of information given throughout the 6 dvd series definitely warrants this type of investment.
